name: Pairot
0:
”Alexa, turn on kitchen lights”
”Alexa, dim bedroom lights by 20 percent”
”Alexa, set living room to 21 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill allows the use of Alexa to control your home, through the Pairot Smart Home connector for KNX. Control your KNX smart home with your voice! A xxter Pairot device is required for this skill to work. 

The installation manual can be found here: https://www.xxter.com/docs/PairotInstallationManual.pdf and a project configuration How To can be found here: https://www.xxter.com/docs/PairotHowTo.pdf
